comment: amazing professor, great class content! there were 4 tests and 4 papers, both relatively short and very fair! the only other grades in the class were from a few forum posts. i loved this course, can't recommend her enough!

Dr. G is a really great professor. Attendance is not mandatory, but it helps to go to class. All PowerPoints are posted online. Her tests are all short answer, but she provides a study guide with the exact questions a week before. There are two five page papers, which are graded relatively easy by the TAs. Also, there are 10 easy online assignments
